page.title: Bundui Premium Dashboards
page.description: Reference implementations mirroring the latest Bundui Premium version. These are demo/reference dashboards using our monorepo architecture and Shadcn UI.

default.name: Default
default.description: Main landing dashboard with overview of key metrics, team members, and revenue tracking

academy.name: Academy
academy.description: Learning management system with courses, progress tracking, and student analytics

analytics.name: Analytics
analytics.description: Comprehensive analytics dashboard with sales, earnings, and campaign metrics

crm.name: CRM
crm.description: Customer relationship management with deals, customers, and sales pipeline

ecommerce.name: E-commerce
ecommerce.description: E-commerce dashboard with products, orders, and sales analytics

hospitalManagement.name: Hospital Management
hospitalManagement.description: Hospital management system with patients, appointments, and medical records

hotel.name: Hotel
hotel.description: Hotel management dashboard with bookings, rooms, and guest management

payment.name: Payment
payment.description: Payment processing dashboard with transactions and payment methods

projects.name: Projects
projects.description: Project management with tasks, timelines, and team collaboration

projectList.name: Project List
projectList.description: Project list view with kanban boards and project organization

sales.name: Sales
sales.description: Sales dashboard with revenue tracking, deals, and performance metrics

aiChat.name: AI Chat
aiChat.description: AI-powered chat interface with multiple model support and conversation history
